"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { X } from "lucide-react" import "./Modal.css" const CreateListModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, onCreate }) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState("") const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false) if (!isOpen) return null const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!title.trim()) return setIsSubmitting(true) await onCreate(title) setTitle("") setIsSubmitting(false) } return (

Create New List

setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter list title" autoFocus />
) } export default CreateListModal;
